author: ngn
msg: Add null checks in constructor and toString

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2052: Enable setting Loggers to inherit their Level from an ancestor. Highlight the Runtime Loggers that have a level defined in the configuration file to aid inheritance visibility.

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2016: Add ability to reload the Log4J configuration file on request using the management console

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2051: Make the LoggingManagementMBean share the lock with QpidLog4JConfigurator,protecting against concurrent access/modifications to the logging configuration file by JMX clients and the WatchDog thread.
